jStrg.network_management.storage_management.core

Class StorageCell

  • java.lang.Object
    • jStrg.database.DatabaseEntity
      • jStrg.network_management.storage_management.core.StorageCell
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ILocationStandardValues, Location
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    AmazonS3Bucket, GoogleCloudBucket, MasterCache, StorageServer

    @Entity
public abstract class StorageCell
extends DatabaseEntity
implements Location
    Standard attributes every storage cell must implement.

      • get_location_for_size

        public static Location get_location_for_size(long _size,
                                             Location.TYPE _type)
        searches for a suitable location for a file to write. By now, this is choosen by most available space.
        Parameters:
        _size - that is needed to write
        _type - storage type to look for
        Returns:
        location object

      • verify_cachefile

        protected static java.io.File verify_cachefile(java.lang.String _got_digest,
                                               java.lang.String _need_digest,
                                               java.lang.String _destination)
        Little helper to verify the file gotten from storage backend.
        Parameters:
        _got_digest - computed while download
        _need_digest - value from database
        _destination - location of the real file
        Returns:
        real file, null in case of failure
